website_summaries.verdict: With some practice, this machine becomes a fun family favorite. It's not a commercial machine, though, and it doesn't work fast enough for large parties.
pros: Makes cotton candy, hard candy, and sugar floss
Clear rim guard helps you see what's going on
Extremely quiet at first, but some say it gets louder over time
cons: Works slower than commercial machines, and some report that the motor may fail

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-Industrial Machine (look no further)
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this company makes INDUSTRIAL cotton candy machines, it only makes sense to buy from the people who specialize in it! Pros; FAST warm up, EASY CLEAN, EASY ASSEMBLY, takes different types of candy not just floss sugar, CAPABLE OF MAKING LARGE FLUFFY AND COPIOUS AMMOUNTS OF COTTON CANDY, looks adorable. Cons; None whatsoever, everyone is jealous of my cotton candy machine. :D
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: This machine is Amazing my grandkids loves it and even my mother who ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This machine is Amazing my grandkids loves it and even my mother who is 85. I like how I can put hard candy and it turns into cotton candy "Root beer barrel" so good and the smell of the different candies, again Amazing. After a whole day of making cotton candy at a party I am going to get the commercial one before my cub scouts carnival. Thank you from all of us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Bummer Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad that this didn't work! We read the directions and plugged it in to preheat it. It ran for maybe 5 minutes and then turned off, never to come on again! It was a gift for my daughter's birthday and I ordered it early, making it too late to return it. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Kboo

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Ok im not sure if I'm keeping this item, i spent 80$ for this machine and the sticks,sugar and bags for a carnival themed party im having. I tried making cotton candy with the cotton candy sugar and it takes forever to get a small amount, my hands cant swist the stick fast enough and it just makes a mess. The machine is louder than i expected too. It is a nice lil machine it was super simple to put together right out the box. But it is just so slow. Im going to make a video today and post it. Im hoping i can keep it
customer_reviews.author: melinda69

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is soon fun...We all stand in line in the kitchen lol. My kids love it but I think I love it more and I'm 41.
customer_reviews.author: londra

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This machine appears to be identical to the 'Bella' machine, but the package is slightly different as this includes 10 disposable sticks whereas the Bella machine has 3 plastic reusable sticks. At the time of writing it is also considerably more expensive than the Bella machine despite being otherwise indistinguishable. Unfortunately my unit had been previously opened, then poorly (and incompletely) repackaged, and sold under the guise of 'new', was was not acceptable for me since it is a food preparation item, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful cotton candy machine the kids will be excited about
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the other cotton candy machines that sold for about $170. It broke only after a few uses, hard to use, hard to clean etc. I bought this one due to the appearance, weight and size (easy to store). It works very well. I actually use the cone shape holders versus the ones that come with it as it is easier to hold cotton candy onto the cone. I also love the suction cups on bottom to hold it in place. I have used it 3 times and the kids (6 and 7) love doing their own cotton candy. I bought this for a few play-dates in July 2020 and this will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Shari L.

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: Awsm! Not loud, cute, easy enough to clean (gotta expect some clean-up, right?). Made awsm cotton candy. It's all in the wrist! My brother was a natural, but I could see it required a touch of skill. I suggest looking up how to twirl cotton candy, so you don't blame the machine if your twirling technique is off. My niece and nephews screamed with delight when they opened this gift together, at Christmas! It was hilarious! Wish I had caught that on vid, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Missmia

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My kids got super excited for this. Shoot even I got excited for it. I've only used it once so far. It takes a long time to get a decent amount of cotton candy on the stick. The first one turned out really good. The second one was kind of a mess. I couldn't make it look right after the first. The machine started getting really loud the third time I tried it. It didn't sound right so I ended up turning it off. It was super easy to take apart and clean. I'm excited to use it again. Hopefully it works a little better this time. If anything changes then I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my seven year old who has wanted a cotton candy machine forever. This comes with the machine, some sticks, and the sugar scoop, so you have to order the sugar separately. We got an assortment of the Cotton Candy Express brand. Nothing about this was complicated, the directions were clear and concise. My daughter was even able to disassemble and clean everything herself. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Was easy to make out first ever cotton candy. My son loves it. Only wish it made more at once. Overall we love it! Note* you will need to get your own floss sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money buying this product. Used one time and it froze up after making only 3 very tiny cotton candy swabs. Disappointing and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this little cotton candy machine. It heats up very quickly and the cotton candy just appears like magic before the little one's eyes. It is so fun to watch the little one's see their cotton candy appear. I thought it would be a real mess to clean but after it cooled I put the 3 washable parts into a sink full of warm water with dawn dish soap and it cleaned up so easily with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie

customer_reviews.title: It works for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but I do have issues. It takes about 10 minutes to be hot enough to use. Barely. After the 2nd sugar fill up, the strands start coming out less easily. The machine gets clogged at that point. It has to do with the small nature of this machine. I'm only mildly disappointed because it was inexpensive and I knew what I was buying. Moving forward, I would get a larger machine that has a better heat source.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: When our first machine malfunctioned, the seller replaced it and gave us three bottles of sugar floss at no charge. The new machine works great, better with the sugar floss than with hard candy, but they both work, and we're very pleased. If you use hard candies, break them up before putting them into the machine.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good for a treat for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: It actually makes cotton candy. It took a while to heat up and took a while to get enough candy on the cone. Probably not a good idea for a Birthday party with 29 kids. But with a small group, it would be fine. The kids thought it was the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Carla  Cross

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get it to turn on :(
customer_reviews.text: My sons got this for Christmas this past year. We took it out of the box to use it for the first time today and turned it on...nothing. I called my husband in to mess with it and after tapping it a few times, he was able to get it to turn on. We got four small things of cotton candy before it turned off for good. My kids are short disappointed and I can’t find a customer service number to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRESH IS BEST
customer_reviews.text: IT GETS HOT AND NOT FOR KIDS TO USE WITHOUT PARENT BUT THE COTTON CANDY IS THE BEST WHEN YOU MAKE IT FRESH.,AND WHEN WE WERE DONE WE JUST LET IT COOL DOWN. THERE WAS A RING OF HARD CANDY FROM THE COTTON CANDY FLOSS SUGAR IT WAS JUST AS GOOD AS THE COTTON CANDY, WAS VERY EASY TO CLEAN JUST WIPED IT OFF WITH A SOFT CLOTH AND SOAPY WATER. It's READY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sellars

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine, it's easy to use and clean but you have to buy sugar separately. I used the gold medal candy floss ($20 for blue and pink) and it's delicious. The sticks that come with the machine are a little annoying when the cotton candy becomes bigger, it gets harder to spin so I would suggest buying or making your own paper cones so that the floss has something better to grab onto. The sticks do come in handy because you have to break off the sugar stuck to the sides after every other round of sugar. Let the machine heat up for 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: bill p.

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: so i bought this candy maker for my kids birthday party - this is NOT the machine for that unless you have many many patient children or can otherwise distract them. it IS great for small family get togethers and any time you want cotton candy. please read and follow directions and machine works as intended. i did discover that crushing jolly ranchers and mixing plain white sugar together makes a fluffier cotton candy ball that's jolly rancher flavored. my machine stopped heating after about 4 - 5 months but the company was quite responsive when emailed about the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!! It is ready to use, works great and mostly easy to clean up.. The only party I'm not loving is the fact that the part that melts the sugar is hard to clean. Not impossible, just harder than the rest of the unit! Also it is a little loud after the first use. I would buy it again tho inn a heartbeat!! In the 3 days we've had it we've used it at least 6 times!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it's an ok machine
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could've gotten one of the bigger cotton candy machines for our birthday party but had to settle on this since there was a time restraint. It's ok. You can only make 1-2 decent size cones of cotton candy before you need to clean it out, otherwise you won't get much on the rest of the cones. If you can, spring for one of the bigger machines..way easier to use. It is hard to spin the cotton candy onto a cone without it touching the heat source
customer_reviews.author: Paige M. Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Makes a noise. I am confused.
customer_reviews.text: This works great but I have done everything to "snap it together" and the top plastic thing still moves and makes a loud noise when we turn it on. Not sure if anyone else has had this issue. The top snaps but doesn't hold. I am so confused.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: My family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my great niece and nephews. The first thing one of the kids said after unwrapping it was "Oh, we have one of those." Great, just great. A redundant gift. Their mom called me a month later and told me how amazing this brand/item was compared to the one they had purchased. This one worked much better and was so easy to clean. She actually donated her old cotton candy machine and kept this one. Yeah! I win!!
customer_reviews.author: Girl Chain

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, use and wash! I used this with the sugar based cotton candy, and worked wonderfully. Made just enough to satisfy my sugar craving (and bring back some fun childhood memories) lol Washed up easily, with just 3 pieces to remove and wash up, base wiped off easily. Will use often I am sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The first one didn't work and we sent it back. No biggie. It's horrible to clean, but the kids love it. And the cotton candy is really awesome. Guess I'm not a carny at heart.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy D

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton candy maker
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING- this machine is awesome. We use jolly ranchers, candy canes, and mints, sofar. We have only been using it for a few days but have already been having alot of fun with it. Its also so easy to clean, my 14 yr old cleans it when hes done.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Got about two small cotton candies out of this before it turned into a complete mess. The sugar stuck all to the inside because if you touch the middle part when trying to swirl it on the cone it melts all the sugar and cakes up all over the sides. Barely functional, every small move was a disaster.. so disappointed ended up throwing the whole thing away!
customer_reviews.author: daria

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and incomplete
customer_reviews.text: So this is the first time I’ve bought something on Amazon and been disappointed. It didn’t come with a scoop or instructions and the clear plastic guard was cracked when it arrived. Very easy to clean but so much of the sugar gets wasted on the inside of the pink plastic bowl. It’s like it flies out of the center and crystallizes on the rim of the bowl rather than melting down into cotton candy. It’s definitely not something you could use for a birthday party. It takes forever to make even a small amount. It’s pretty much what I expected for the cost but could’ve at least come with what’s advertised and not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Hurlburt

customer_reviews.title: The product is OK but definitely could be better.
customer_reviews.text: So this product is OK. It’s not like you can make a ton of candy with it at once. And I have really only got it to make hard candy which is OK. It’s overpriced. Could be cheaper because it’s not that great actually.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Works great, makes great cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son you can use sugar or hard candy. Super easy to use and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!  It Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Following directions and cutting hard candies in half works best. And longer heat up time for sugar floss. This machine is great!
customer_reviews.author: Deep Puddle

customer_reviews.title: Also sounds like a lawnmower when in use
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly but the metal bowl you put the sugar in does not lock in at all causing the bowl to slowly lift off of the red hot burning coils and fling everywhere. Also sounds like a lawnmower when in use. There may be safer and more reliable machines out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my fiancee very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. I love the different flavors. Also, the option to use hard candy. Only 1 (one) problem, everybody wants me to make them a cotton candy cone. Oh well, that's me problem. My fiancee is addicted to cotton candy. We use it everyday. I would give it 10 stars if I could. Easy to use, easy to clean. It is aslo excellent quality. Worth every penny. Thank you very much. We really do love it. Ed Archambeault. edarchambeault11061962@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Ed Archambeault

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Easy to use . I tried all flavors and they are great
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Searched high and low for a quality cotton candy maker and decided on this one over the cheaper looking models. I never write reviews but I feel compelled to with this machine because it's junk right out of the box. The metal plate sounds like it's going to fly off at any moment and hurt someone, which makes for a scary experience with something that's supposed to be "fun". To make matters worse, the clear lid keeps popping off after 10 seconds of warming up the metal plate. So here I have this ridiculously hot plate and the clear lid that serves as a barrier is popping off to expose it! It's going back. I'll try the cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: Vala213

customer_reviews.title: Works best with hard candy
customer_reviews.text: Works best with hard candy. Using the included sugar is OK, you’ll do much better if you use her own hard candy. The flavor, texture, and ease of use of the machine will be so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, there’s def a technique to gathering up the cotton candy without it getting caught in the spinner. When it does get caught in the spinner it’s very hard to recover but that happens cause it’s a small bowl (obviously not a commercial size machine ) i need more practice but it’s still a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bernacki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy it was to put together and use and just make the cotton candy in general. Didn’t really dislike anything besides that it didn’t have sugar floss in it I had to order that separately but still super fun and easy to do
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Seals

customer_reviews.title: Money worth spent!
customer_reviews.text: My kids received a cotton candy maker for Christmas that was a lot cheaper but also didn’t really produce the desired results, so this was a replacement. Money worth spent! It was so easy to put together and to use! The best part, all removable parts are dishwasher safe (a mother’s dream come true)! I’ve already got tons of event and ideas planned for this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L.

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME. So fun
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME. So fun! If you warm the machine a good 10 minutes before use, granulated super product and crushed candy works very well. It throws up a cloud of wispy cotton candy and all the kids around the machine we’re delughted and engrossed. So glad to get kids away from absorbing electronics and back to nostalgic fun!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenLovesDogs

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: The machine was pretty easy to use but you had to let cool after just 2-3 cones. I had my 7 grandkids here and it was just to long of a process. Cleaning the plastic parts was easy but everything else was a mess and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cotton candy machine after reading the reviews and looking at some YouTube videos. I got this purchase in 1 day. I set it up without any issues, and was able to make cotton candy in 10 minutes. I would recommend this machine to anyone who would like to make cotton candy for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... making cotton candy Christmas Day and the candy was good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my neice and she was making cotton candy Christmas Day and the candy was good!
customer_reviews.author: Albert  A.  Laville  III

customer_reviews.title: Yuumm
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas! We both love this. Definitely YouTube up how to use it, and it's super easy. I've never tried making cotton candy out of a peppermint, but I did this time, it was amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Khristian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cotton Candy Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing my daughter wanted for Christmas and I was so worried about the mess it would create! I was so surprised and pleased when we made cotton candy on Christmas day and it wasn't messy!!!!!!!! The machine was so simple to assemble, the candy was easy to make and tasty, and clean up was a breeze. My daughter is one happy girl and the parents are pretty pleased, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jspod

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas, he’d been asking for one for 3 years! It’s really fun and easy to use. It was missing one of the parts when we opened it. I emailed the company through Amazon, and in less than 24 hours they had shipped out a replacement part PLUS a cotton candy sugar kit! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but very slow and a bit messy
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great using this machine but it takes a LONG time to make even just one cone. When making a lot of cones for a party it was super messy and difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter she lovessss it! Thought it would include at least one package of sugar but it didn’t
customer_reviews.author: The Realest Glamma

customer_reviews.title: Kinda slow but good enough
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first hour or so. Started making a really loud rattling noise after that. Still works, it’s just super loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This worked and did the job my grandson loved it. But it did burn the sugar rather fast. I’m not sure if that’s how all cotton candy machines work or not.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandjoe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So it says you cannuse any hard candy but i found no matter what type or how much a smash it up it does not work good. The best stuff to use is the cotton candy floss. Other then that its good the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: This machine broke after only two uses. Really disappointed as we are out of the return window. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Endless flavor possibilities. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you do not put Xtreme Sour Megawarheads in this machine, you are missing out on the greatest joy your tastebuds will ever know. This is the best at-home cotton candy I've ever used. Makes a small batch, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: George Chell

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for at-home cotton candy!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few tries but I got the hang of it quickly and I love it! Works great for a little at-home machine! Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Confgirl06

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for  a party or a home treat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fast and easy to clean for continued use and produces a delicious tasty treat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy machine works well. However it's quite slow it takes a few minutes to get a full cotton candy on the stick. For a small group is just fine. For a full class of kids it's really hassle to make the cotton candy, I would recommend a commercial type.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cotton candy machine for home use. It is easy to use and clean up. It has no problem making several cotton candies at a time and the cotton candy taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Henry

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like this
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this for my duaghters birthday party. It took too long to heat up and the cotton candy was not coming out right. The lid broke when it hit my counter. I am sorry I won't be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Evelin C.

customer_reviews.title: Hard working great fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters favorite Christmas gift, we had a night where we tried so many different hard candies. This machine worked like a charm for this 10 year old, we had so much fun making so many different flavors. It kept right on going!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice for the price! Only bad thing was the straws that come with it for the cotton candy to get on. Very difficult to use! It was hard getting the cotton candy to stay on it while swirling around! So I ordered REAL cotton candy sticks and it worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: KT@AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love This Amazon Cotton Candy Machine! It is Wonderful Works Really well! I had to buy a seperate Kit, because it doesn't come with Cotton Candy Flavors. Their is so many different kits to go with the cotton machine to buy separately! I am so happy I got this machine! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for Christmas. We can’t use it because it’s missing pieces. Super bummed! We called and they are closed for the holiday. Hoping to call and actually get someone tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie B Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids/family.
customer_reviews.text: Fun and really work for home use. Probably too slow to use for a birthday party, so recommend for family use anytime.
customer_reviews.author: MC_CA

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this cotton candy machine. Fun for the entire family. Fun for sleepovers. Easy to use. Easy to clean up!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bballfan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for a fun home night, can't make a piece larger then a tennis ball in a single go
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great until the 4th use back to back but other then that it’s great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Giordan dodge

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to use. A bit on the noisy side but works great
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. Easy to use just a bit louder than expected when using
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cote

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The wait time isnt terrible, the cotton candy tasted great, and it was a lot of fun! We had a little trial run, but this will be used for our 2 year olds birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: abbie g.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this after going to a fair and have used it at least 20 times.
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use and makes great cotton candy. I have tried hard candy as well as flavored cotton candy powders. i like the powders more but they both work. I just let it heat up for 10 min then make a cone in like 3 min.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Nitz

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: One scoop of sugar and it makes a small amount of cotton candy for one stick. DO NOT expect it to make a carnival size serving of cotton candy with one scoop of sugar. And I wish it came with a sample pack of sugar. Kids like it and are having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: I think that if you are going to use a cotton candy machine a lot then YES this is worth it. I used it for a little over 2 months and it worked just like new just remember to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon :D

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT recommend i have used it for months then all the sudden it catches on fire luckily i unplugged it and set the fire out before it set anything else on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Not simple to degunk once candy has baked on after extended use. Cute and compact. I used it for my child birthday and for cotton candy cocktails during a catered event. Not ideal for mass production. Small birthday Party yes, 100 cocktail toppers?... no.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Divine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it never worked. i returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gray

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters first birthday and it was a hit with the adults and kids. It’s easy to clean just soak the parts in hot water. The cotton candy comes out nice and fluffy and taste extra yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Noelette

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It only works to make two cotton candies and it didn't work anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: So bummed. Delivered with the interior box opened and top was cracked. It was my daughter's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Meyer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Welp. This thing is awesome and I my sons favorite Christmas present. It is very easy to use and works great! Great addition to our family!
customer_reviews.author: Md

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Perfect for me and my son. Makes cute little clouds of cotton candy. Just enough for one helping. Works great! Definitely takes some practice learning how to spin the cone correctly to collect the cotton candy. Top plastic piece doesnt click so it vibrates when machine is on and is noisy but no real problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hit with the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it, they have taken it camping several weekends and are the hit of the campgrounds. Seems to work great and because they are thrilled, so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Walters

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times. Now it won’t power up or heat up or spin. Nothing happens. Burnt out motor. 1st time used I made 6 cotton candys. 2nd time I made 6. 3rd time I made 10. Then it never turned back on again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Slightly hard to clean some crevices but everything else is easy to clean and disassemble. Works well and makes great cotton candy
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Not all included
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write a good review but my granddaughter hasn't gotten to use it because it was missing the 10 packets that was supposed to be included. My daughter in law didn't want to say anything to me but granddaughter just told me. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I purchased thinking it would produce the perfect size cotton candy for my 4 year old grandchildren. They were so small that even my grand babies were disappointed. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal monsibais

customer_reviews.title: Works slow at first but be patient.... Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product!! It worked well but I need to let others know that it takes a while for the sugar to get flowing. The first 2 that we did took a while to make but by the 3rd one it was flowing quickly and once it sped up, it was easy to make the cotton candy and FUN!! We used Floss sugar, not hard candy so I don’t know how well it works with that. My 14, 12 and 4 year old grandkids really liked playing with this and can’t wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: Makes great cotton candy. My only issue is that it's loud and it sometimes takes a while for the cotton candy to be made(even after properly preheating it). Other than that, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Easy to use. Lids makes alot of noise at times. Cotton Candy turns out yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids!
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and happy with the product. Followed advice on spinning from the side and allowing a few minutes warm up time before adding cotton candy floss. Easy to use, but a bit messy to clean up. Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: gmail

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but the noise is unbearable. After the second try no cotton candy could be made.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Good cotton candy but cheaply made construction, the protective plastic shield cracked the very first time using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my little granddaughter who doesn't need something too ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my little granddaughter who doesn't need something too big but wanted a cotton candy machine. She was elated. She has used over and over to make cotton candy for her and her friend.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Yeild is low.
customer_reviews.text: It's not nearly as good as real machines. Thee yeild is low and wastes sugar. If the kid who got it as a gift liked it as much as me, it would have 1-2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A random joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it.i gave my 8 yr old daughter as her xmas gift. Its works so beautifully !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire!!!
customer_reviews.text: It caught on fire!!!! After making just 3 on the first time using it. It was scary and very happy the kids were supervised. Do not buy this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: So fun.
customer_reviews.text: Hit of our party. Everyone loved it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: K.m.c.

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton candy maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small cotton candy maker for a BBQ last Saturday. My 9 year old son entertained his younger siblings and cousins. The kids had a blast. So simple a 9 year old can use with proper supervision.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This was a HUGE HIT at a couple birthday parties we have had and the kids can make their own cotton candy. That blew their minds!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I need more practice but this machine got the job done. Kids were satisfied and flavor was good. Looking forward to using hard candy and seeing the turnout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.  Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: The box is missing the paper cones to stir the cotton candy onto. They say on the box and in the description that they are included. Only option is to return the entire item which would cost more to do.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zerafa

product_meta.title: The Candery Cotton Candy Machine - Bright, Colorful Style- Makes Hard Candy, Sugar Free Candy, Sugar Floss, Homemade Sweets for Birthday Parties - Includes 10 Candy Cones & Scooper
feature_bullets: CREATE & ENJOY - It takes only minutes to get sugar sweets spinning and ready to enjoy. Easily create cotton candy cones, hard candies & sugar floss.
COLORFUL DESIGN - A truly uniquecandy floss machine, our cotton candy maker looks bright and colorful with a modern, kitchen-friendly décor style.
FUN FOR ALL AGES - Parents and children alike can enjoy making sweet candies together thanks to the clear rim guard, stable feet, and simple design.
COMPLETE KIT - Lightweight and quiet, each treat maker comes with everything you need for homemade sweet treats, including 10 candy cones and a sugar scoop!
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - The Candery cotton candy machine is backed reliable, high-quality construction and a guarantee for quality assurance.
